column4: Just wanted to let every OSS user know, a hair and makeup artist I've used for a number of shoots I've done using Open Source Software: GIMP, Inkscape, Blender, Ubuntu Linux, Shotwell, Darktable.... is a finalist for Affliction Clothing Model. Please go vote for her. It would be a great way to support Open Source Software! :)
A shot I did of her with Open Source Software: https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?pid=5164210&l=96d13db8c2&id=500284846
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
